Saturday, December 24, 1994. Four terrorists take hostages in an Air France plane in the capital of Algeria to Paris. 227 people on board. Nobody knows their intentions: they are armed and seem determined. The terrorists demanded the release of their partners and a new plane. Even after long negotiations, the plane, even with hostages, takes off from the airport. Monday, December 26th, 3:33 am. The aircraft arrived in Paris. A soldier, a technocrat ambitious and a Muslim will determine their fate. Front of 21 million viewers, the decision of the three main characters will put an end to this terrorist action unprecedented in history ... A harbinger of the terrible events of September 11. (Ancine) Based on a true story, the SWAT is designed to save the passengers of an Air France plane that had been hijacked.
